channel.title: Beastie Boys Announce New Record for This Fall
channel.description:
Really looking forward to this, especially after The Mix-Up which was a great record, but I missed the usual humourous lyrical stylings characteristic of the Beastie Boys.
Apparently they announced the news on the Jimmy Fallon Show (which I still can't bear to watch).
IGN has more to say, and the additional releases sounds great.
[url]https://music.ign.com/articles/986/986516p1.html[/url]

item.title: Beastie Boys Announce New Record for This Fall
item.dc:creator: InterloperX
item.description:
Dude, they just released an album about 2 years ago. Because it was primarily instrumental I can imagine why there wasn’t much airplay.

Still alive and kickin’.

item.title: Beastie Boys Announce New Record for This Fall
